There can be no thought of finishing for "aiming for the stars." Both figuratively and literally, it is a task to occupy the generations. And no matter how much progress one makes, there is always the thrill of just beginning.

Basic hierarchy

Page title (h1)

It suddenly struck me that that tiny pea, pretty and blue, was the Earth. I put up my thumb and shut one eye, and my thumb blotted out the planet Earth. I didn't feel like a giant. I felt very, very small. (lead paragraph)

This is a lead paragraph black, including mid-tones and tints, and thoughtful use of whitespace. A minimal palette, clear hierarchy, good information design, and ample whitespace will ensure a voice of authority and expertise in communication.
